alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 11:22AM EST until January 09 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of less than a tenth of an inch of ice accumulation. * WHERE...Clinton and Ingham counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy roads. Secondary roads, bridges and overpasses, parking lots, and sidewalks are most susceptible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle is expected to begin early tonight and continue into the early morning hours of Sunday before ending prior to daybreak. Temperatures at the start of this event will mostly in the mid 20s. Drizzle falling into air that cold will quickly result in a coating of ice on all untreated surfaces. While the air temperature is expected to rise to near freezing south of Route 20 after midnight, the ground will remain below freezing. That will resulting in icy conditions on untreated surfaces lingering into mid morning on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
